title: Patient Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a receptionist can successfully register a patient with complete and valid information including CPF, phone, email, clinical history, and emergency contact.

steps.description: Navigate to patient registration page.
Input valid CPF, phone number, email, clinical history, and emergency contact.
Submit the registration form.
Verify patient is successfully registered and confirmation is shown.

title: Patient Registration with Invalid CPF
description: Verify that the system prevents registration for patients with an invalid CPF, showing appropriate validation error.

steps.description: Navigate to patient registration page.
Input invalid CPF along with other valid patient data.
Submit the registration form.
Verify an error message is displayed for invalid CPF and registration is blocked.

title: Patient Search by Name and CPF with Fast Response
description: Verify that searching for patients by name or CPF returns accurate results in less than 2 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to patient search interface.
Enter a valid patient name and trigger search.
Verify relevant patients are displayed within 2 seconds.
Enter a valid CPF and trigger search.
Verify the patient matching the CPF is displayed within 2 seconds.

title: Create Appointment Without Conflict
description: Verify that a receptionist can schedule an appointment in a free time slot without conflicts and the system confirms the booking.

steps.description: Open the calendar appointment interface.
Select an available date and time slot for a specific physiotherapist.
Enter appointment details and save the appointment.
Verify appointment is created and displayed on the calendar.

title: Prevent Appointment Scheduling with Time Conflict
description: Ensure the system blocks scheduling an appointment if the selected time slot is already occupied for the same professional and notifies the user.

steps.description: Attempt to schedule an appointment in a time slot already booked for the same physiotherapist.
Submit the appointment request.
Verify that the system shows a conflict error and prevents appointment creation.

title: Reschedule Appointment using Drag-and-Drop
description: Verify that appointments can be rescheduled by dragging and dropping to a different valid time slot on the calendar, updating the appointment accordingly.

steps.description: Open the calendar with existing appointments.
Drag an existing appointment to a free, valid time slot.
Confirm the appointment reflects the new date/time and no conflicts exist.

title: Register Clinical Session with Complete SOAP Notes and Pain Map
description: Verify physiotherapist can register a clinical session including structured SOAP notes, interact with pain map, record EVA pain scale, and attach documents.

steps.description: Navigate to the patient's clinical session recording interface.
Fill out structured SOAP notes.
Mark points on the interactive pain map.
Record pain level using the EVA pain scale.
Attach relevant clinical documents to the session.
Save the clinical session.
Verify the clinical session is saved correctly with all data and attachments.

title: Manage and Notify Waitlist for Appointment Cancellations
description: Verify that when an appointment is cancelled, the system automatically offers the slot to waitlisted patients and manages timeout for their confirmation.

steps.description: Cancel an existing appointment in the system.
Check that waitlisted patients receive notification of the available slot.
Simulate waitlisted patient confirming acceptance within timeout period.
Verify appointment is allocated to waiting patient upon confirmation.
Simulate waitlisted patient not responding within timeout.
Verify system revokes offer and moves to the next patient in the waitlist.

title: Sales Registration and Automatic Debit of Session Packages
description: Verify that receptionist can register the sale of session packages, the system automatically debits sessions upon use, and alerts about package validity.

steps.description: Register a package sale for a patient including package type and sessions count.
Verify the package is recorded in patient's financial records.
Conduct a patient session and confirm that one session is debited automatically.
Verify the package sessions count is decremented accurately.
Approach package expiration date.
Verify that system alerts receptionist of package validity expiration.

title: Financial Integration with Stripe and Payment Alert Notifications
description: Verify integration with Stripe for processing payments and that the system generates appropriate financial alerts and updates after transactions.

steps.description: Initiate a payment transaction using Stripe integration for a session package.
Verify payment is processed and recorded successfully.
Check that the system displays alert notifications for successful or failed payment.

title: Exercise Library Browsing and Personalized Prescription
description: Verify that users can browse the exercise library with videos and that physiotherapists can prescribe personalized exercises to patients with sending functionality.

steps.description: Access the exercise library and browse through exercise videos.
Verify video previews and exercise details are displayed properly.
Create a personalized exercise prescription for a patient.
Send the prescribed exercises to the patient through the system.
Verify prescription is recorded and patient receives exercise details.

title: Dashboard Real-Time KPI Display and Export
description: Verify that administrators can view real-time KPIs such as occupancy rate, no-show percentage, and revenue, with correct graphical representation and ability to export reports in Excel and PDF.

steps.description: Login as administrator and navigate to the dashboard.
Confirm real-time KPIs are displayed correctly with graphs.
Click options to export reports as Excel and PDF files.
Verify exported files contain accurate and complete KPI data.

title: System Performance Under Load - Page Load Below 2 Seconds
description: Verify that the system maintains page load times under 2 seconds under standard operational load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate typical user load on the system.
Navigate through major pages including dashboard, patient registration, and appointment scheduling.
Measure and confirm each page loads in under 2 seconds.

title: System Availability Smoke Test
description: Perform basic smoke tests after deployment to confirm all critical features are accessible and working to maintain availability above 99.5%.

steps.description: Access login page and authenticate successfully.
Navigate to patient registration, create a test patient, and verify success.
Create an appointment and verify it is listed in the calendar.
Confirm all operations performed without errors.
